(nL2TLBEntries, nDCacheTLBWays).explanation: These are independent cache configuration parameters that can be set independently without one directly causing changes in the other;

(nL2TLBEntries, power_logic).explanation: Increasing the number of L2 TLB entries requires additional logic circuits and transistors, which directly increases the power consumption of logic components;

(nL2TLBEntries, nL2TLBWays).explanation: The number of entries and associativity (ways) are independent design parameters that can be configured separately in TLB design;
